title: Will Voters Ever Get to Render a Judgment on Biden Family Business?
sub_head: Accepting millions of dollars from oligarchs may never carry a political cost.
body:
Now that the establishment press has admitted that the sordid details of Biden family enrichment schemes reported by the New York Post in 2020 are true, there are a few obvious questions. Since media giants both old and new suppressed the story in the fall of 2020, one can only wonder how voters in a close election might have made their decisions if they had not been denied relevant information. And now that media gatekeepers have conceded the story is true, how will voters respond in future elections?
Thereâ€™s certainly an effort to influence such voters. Instead of apologizing, the media pack now seems determined to shape public perception of the Hunter Biden emails rather than simply acknowledging them. This column warned in 2020:
